column1: GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
The Cyclonic Storm “FENGAL” [pronounced as FEINJAL] over Southwest Bay of Bengal was located about
420km north of Trincomalee and about 290km north of Kankasanthurai at 02.30p.m. 30th November 2024.
It is likely to move west-northwestwards and cross north Tamil Nadu-Puducherry coasts as a cyclonic storm
around 30th November, evening. The system is weakening while entering in to India, and its influence on
the island's weather is further reducing.
